recipesJson.name: Me Lychee
recipesJson.author: TendiesNApplesauce
recipesJson.description: I really like CAP sweet lychee and want to make a recipe around it. I developed this a while ago when INW cactus was all the rage and wanted to integrate it, too. I want to tinker with the levels a little but it is a very refreshing all day fruit blend. It even brings to mind the *juiciness* and *fruitiness* of a certain popular gum. I've also bumped the koolada and made it a high nic-salt mix for a pod before and it worked well.
